meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>omen</kanji> for the <kanji>climate</kanji> of things is a <vocabulary>sign</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>indication</vocabulary> of change. If there's an omen, there's going to be a sign as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
